name: Pett Tube
author: Rogerio Pett

sections.description:
Este plugin adiciona um widget que mostra com thumbnails os ultimos videos postados no YouTube sob o username informado.
This plugin show the latest videos thumbnails posted on YouTube under given username.
sections.installation:
1. Upload petttube.php to the /wp-content/plugins/petttube directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Drag and Drop the Pett Tube widget and inform your YouTube username.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First release.

2.0

  • Added new option to display from 1 to 25 video thumbnails.

short_description: Mostre os ultimos videos postados no YouTube. Show the latest YouTube posted videos.
